text.autoconfig.origins-randomiser.title: Origins Randomiser Config
text.autoconfig.origins-randomiser.optio: Toggle global messages about a player's new origin
Drop all items out of extra inventories when your origin is randomised
Toggle whether the use of /randomise is limited to a set number of times
Set the number of times /randomise can be used
Toggle if players have a set number of lives before they are put in spectator mode
Set the number of lives players start with
Set the number of lives between origin randomisation
Set the number of sleeps between origin randomisation
origins-randomiser.command.disabled: Use of the /randomise command has been disabled.
origins-randomiser.command.unlimited: Use of the /randomise command is unlimited. Toggle this with 'limitCommandUses'.
origins-randomiser.lives.disabled: Lives are disabled. Toggle them with 'enableLives'.
origins-randomiser.message.commandLimite: Use of the /randomise command has been limited. You start with
origins-randomiser.message.livesEnabled: Lives have been enabled. You start with
origins-randomiser.message.livesUntilRan: more lives until your origin is randomised.
origins-randomiser.message.randomOriginA: You will receive a random origin after every
origins-randomiser.message.sleepsUntilRa: more sleeps until your origin is randomised.
origins-randomiser.reason.command: randomised their origin and is now a
origins-randomiser.reason.firstJoin: spawned for the first time as a
origins-randomiser.reason.sleep: slept and woke up as a
